HeroBannerTwoProps.main-heading: Flaunt The Love You Get, Because You Deserve It
HeroBannerTwoProps.sub-heading: Shoppers trust product reviews and personal recommendations. With Reacho, you can easily gather, manage, and flaunt authentic reviews in your emails, SMS, and push notifications.

HomeFeatureGridProps.heading: Reacho Makes It Easy To Collect & Celebrate Your Reviews
HomeFeatureGridProps.description: Use genuine customer feedback in your campaigns and across your website to proudly show how much customers love your products.

category-1.name: Automated Collection
category-1.heading: Collect & share reviews rasily
category-1.description: Reacho automatically collects customer feedback after every purchase and even lets you set up workflows to request reviews via email and SMS.

category-2.name: Smart Segmentation
category-2.heading: Turn feedback into action
category-2.description: Segment customers based on their reviews so you can focus your marketing on what matters most to them.

category-3.name: Featured Reviews
category-3.heading: Put a spotlight on top ratings
category-3.description: Shine a spotlight on your top reviews, whether on your store or in emails. Build trust and inspire more customers to choose your products.

category-4.name: Rich Snippets
category-4.heading: Stand out on Google Search
category-4.description: Increase your online store’s visibility by featuring product ratings in Google search results. Attract more traffic and improve your SEO effortlessly.

content-item.label: Creative automation
content-item.title: REWARDING LOYALTY, MADE EASY
content-item.description: Show your customers some love and keep the feedback rolling in with review rewards. Automatically send personalized discounts or special offers to customers who leave reviews. Say goodbye to manual follow-ups and hello to a hassle-free way to boost your review count and customer satisfaction.

content-item.label: Review Analytics
content-item.title: INSIGHTS AT YOUR FINGERTIPS
content-item.description: Unlock the power of your customer reviews with Reacho’s comprehensive review analytics. Track, analyze, and understand customer feedback like never before. Our intuitive dashboards provide actionable insights that help you improve your products, services, and overall customer experience.

content-item.label: Review Syndication
content-item.title: Multi-Channel Review Display
content-item.description: With Reacho’s multi-channel review display, you can show off your best reviews wherever your customers are, be it your store, emails, or social media. Boost credibility and drive conversions by letting your satisfied customers do the talking.

HeroBannerTwoProps.sub-heading: Delight customers at every turn with Reacho’s smart email marketing features. Make your store irresistible.

HomeFeatureGridProps.heading: Boring Out, Brilliant In

content-item.description: Take the grind out of your email campaigns. Reduce the time spent on sending, segmenting, and personalizing emails. Let our automation handle the heavy lifting for you. content-item.description: Segment your customers with precision and craft messages that resonate on a personal level. Say goodbye to one-size-fits-all campaigns. content-item.label: Review Syndication
content-item.title: INSIGHTS THAT DRIVE ACTION
content-item.description: Dive deep into your email campaign performance with detailed analytics. Understand what’s working and what’s not with real-time data at your fingertips. Optimize every campaign by tracking open rates, click-throughs, and conversions, and make sure your strategy is always on point.

content-item.description: Say goodbye to juggling multiple platforms. Reacho unifies email, SMS, push notifications, and more so that you can take care of all your eCommerce marketing in one place. Focus on strategy while Reacho takes care of the execution.

content-item.title: BIG RESULTS AT A SMALL PRICE
content-item.description: Win over your customers effortlessly with Reacho’s automated SMS and email campaigns. From welcome series to re-engagement campaigns, our ready-to-use templates and prebuilt automation do all the heavy lifting – all for less than you’d expect.

content-item.label: Review Syndication

content-item.description: With Reacho, you can easily tune your messages to suit each customer perfectly. Create segments that sync with your customers' actions in real-time to create campaigns that always strike the right note.

HeroBannerTwoProps.main-heading: Streamline Your Support with Reacho Helpdesk
HeroBannerTwoProps.sub-heading: Automate, Organize, and Deliver Exceptional Customer Service—for Free

HomeFeatureGridProps.heading: Wow Your Customers With Reacho
HomeFeatureGridProps.description: Reacho's Helpdesk is a powerful, yet completely free tool designed to simplify your customer support operations. Tailored for eCommerce brands that refuse to compromise on quality, our Helpdesk ensures you can provide top-notch support, for free.

category-1.name: Help Simplified
category-1.heading: Automate the mundane
category-1.description: Reacho’s helpdesk isn’t just about answering questions; it’s about elevating your support. Use smart automation to clear the clutter, allowing your agents to focus on the conversations that truly matter.

category-2.name: Help Everywhere
category-2.heading: A helpdesk that follows you everywhere
category-2.description: Whether your team is on Android, iOS, or the web, Reacho’s helpdesk ensures they’re always ready to assist. From the office to the coffee shop, support doesn’t stop.

category-3.name: Delight Customers
category-3.heading: Turn data into delight
category-3.description: With Reacho’s reports and analytics, your agents know exactly who they are engaging with, what’s working, what’s not, and exactly what to do next. Anticipate needs, resolve issues before they escalate, and keep customers delighted every step of the way.

category-4.name: One Step Ahead
category-4.heading: More than just a helpdesk
category-4.description: Reacho isn’t just a helpdesk; it’s the backbone of your customer experience. With seamless omnichannel marketing integration, it unifies every touchpoint, ensuring your support strategy is consistent, connected, and always one step ahead.

content-item.label: Creative automation
content-item.title: Unified Inbox
content-item.description: Manage all customer communications from a single dashboard. Emails, chats, and social media messages are consolidated for easy access and efficient handling.

content-item.label: Review Analytics
content-item.title: Support Automation
content-item.description: Automate repetitive tasks with smart workflows. Use canned responses, automated ticket assignments, and tagging to streamline your support process and reduce response times.

content-item.label: Review Syndication
content-item.title: Customer Insights
content-item.description: Access detailed customer profiles, including order history and previous interactions, directly within each ticket. Personalize your responses to build stronger customer relationships.

HomeFeatureGridProps.heading: Turn Conversations into Conversions

category-1.name: Automated Chat
category-1.heading: Take the heat off your agents with chatbots
category-1.description: Resolve most basic queries and conflicts with chatbots, and let your agents easily handle complex customer issues.

category-2.name: Chat Anywhere

category-2.description: Reacho works across Android, iOS, and the web, letting you engage with your customers wherever you go. With Reacho, your agents are right there when customers need them most.

category-3.heading: Know your customers from every angle
category-3.description: Guesswork out. Smart decisions in. With Reacho’s easy-to-use analytics, you no longer need an analyst; resolve customer issues backed by data and reports.

category-4.heading: Capture, chat, convert
category-4.description: Capture website visitors and immediately engage with them through automated chatbot messages.

content-item.description: Set up automated messages to welcome visitors or respond to common inquiries. This ensures prompt engagement even when your team is busy.

content-item.label: Review Syndication

content-item.description: Monitor visitor behavior in real-time. See which pages they're viewing and tailor your support to their interests, enhancing personalization.

HeroBannerTwoProps.sub-heading: Let Reacho improve your targeting, personalization, and reporting of all marketing activities.

HomeFeatureGridProps.heading: Elevate Every Interaction, From Engagement to Support

content-item.label: Streamline Your Campaigns

content-item.description: Refine your marketing strategy with Reacho's automation, tapping into pre-built flows such as welcome sequences, cart recovery, and win-back campaigns. These customizable flows are crafted to respond automatically to key customer behaviors, ensuring you capture and engage at every opportunity.

content-item.label: Effortless Customer Engagement
content-item.title: SMS Marketing Solved
content-item.description: Craft and segment messages with precision, using behavioral cues to tailor each interaction. Automate the essentials—scheduling, targeting, and follow-ups—to keep your communication consistent and compelling.

content-item.description: Enhance customer support with integrated live chat and helpdesk tools. Harness the power of automated sorting and data insights to swiftly manage support tickets and personalize responses. Seamlessly integrate with popular eCommerce platforms like Shopify to update and streamline every customer interaction from one central location.

HeroBannerTwoProps.main-heading: Win Back Attention with a Timely Tap
HeroBannerTwoProps.sub-heading: Never miss a beat with your customers, even when they've left your site. Reacho's push feature helps you stay at the top of their mind with flash notifications, personalized product recommendations, timely shipping updates, and more!

HomeFeatureGridProps.heading: Lock in Loyalty with Every Ping
HomeFeatureGridProps.description: Don't let your customers forget you after one purchase. Use Reacho’s push notifications to send timely and targeted messages so that they keep coming back for more.

content-item.label: INSIGHTFUL ANALYTICS

content-item.description: Track how your customers engage with your push notifications, tweak your strategy in real time, and see the impact of every message you send. With Reacho’s easy-to-use tools, you’re not just guessing—you’re making smart, informed decisions that drive revenue.

content-item.title: PERSONALIZE, ENGAGE, CAPTIVATE
content-item.description: With Reacho’s smart segmentation, you can tailor your push notifications to specific customer segments based on their shopping behavior. Send personalized offers, product recommendations, and updates to create meaningful engagement for your customers.
